reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Rural Development Services and Agriculture - Awareness raising on hazardous child labour

description.narrative: NGO Rural Development Service group is a unique organization operating in Kosovo helping rural areas. Thir technical expertise is in agricultural production training and research rural development facilitation communication social research and project mana gement. The overall objective of this project is support to Government Strategy and Action Plan for prevention and Elimination of Child Labour. Specific objectives are:1: By the end of the project 50 children at risk of entering HCL in agriculture will be prevented and 40 children involved in HCL in agriculture will be withdrawn2: By the end of the project municipal and community response against HCL in agriculture will be enhanced3: By the end of the project local awareness advocacy and social mobilization for the prevention of HCL in agriculture in the targeted areas will have been effectively and successfully promoted
